data.name: Among Ass 2: Butt Warfare
data.detailed_description:
Asses are back in an adrenaline-pumping sequel! Now you can fight back bad asses with big boom sticks! Gather friends and choose a side of the conflict.

The game is an arena shooter where each player takes a role regular ass. Each of them has its own goals, depending on the selected game mode. Defend important elements of the ship, repair, or clash in a battle for survival where the only goal is to stay alive.

Freatures:
*Large number of game settings and the ability to add bots
*Customization. Customize the color and different hats and accessories
*large number of different types of weapons
*Local multiplayer up to 2 players
*Ability to play through the "Steam Remote Play" online!
*3 different game modes
*Gachi Mode is back in the sequel!

data.short_description: Asses are back in an adrenaline-pumping sequel! Now you can fight back bad asses with big boom-sticks! Gather friends and choose a side of the conflict.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 or higher
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible with DirectX 8.1
  • DirectX: Version 8.1
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains scenes of a light sexual nature.
